categori ii (nation park) cassidi arch locat wayne, garfield, sevier, emeri counties, utah, usa nearest&#160;c torrey coordin 38°12′0″n 111°10′0″w﻿ / ﻿38.20000°n 111.16667°w﻿ / 38.20000; -111.16667coordinates: 38°12′0″n 111°10′0″w﻿ / ﻿38.20000°n 111.16667°w﻿ / 38.20000; -111.16667 area 241,904 acr (377.975&#160;sq&#160;mi; 97,895&#160;ha; 978.95&#160;km2) 670 acr (1.05&#160;sq&#160;mi; 270&#160;ha; 2.7&#160;km2) private[1] establish decemb 18, 1971 visitor 786,514 (in&#160;2014)[2] governing&#160;bodi nation park servic http://www.nps.gov/care/index.htm capitol reef nation park unit state nation park, south-centr utah. 100 mile (160&#160;km) long fairli narrow. park, establish 1971, preserv 241,904 acr (377.98&#160;sq&#160;mi; 97,895.08&#160;ha; 978.95&#160;km2) open year, although may septemb popular months. call "wayn wonderland" 1920 local booster ephraim p. pectol joseph s. hickman, capitol reef nation park protect color canyons, ridges, buttes, monoliths. 75&#160;mi (121&#160;km) long up-thrust call waterpocket fold, rug spine extend thousand lake mountain lake powell, preserv within park. "capitol reef" name especi rug spectacular segment waterpocket fold near fremont river.[3] area name line white dome cliff navajo sandstone, look somewhat like unit state capitol building, run fremont river pleasant creek waterpocket fold. local word reef refer rocki barrier travel.[4] easi road access came 1962, construct state rout 24 fremont river canyon.[3] content 1 geographi 2 histori 2.1 nativ american mormon 2.2 earli protect effort 2.3 administr monument 2.4 nation park statu 3 geolog 4 visit park 5 refer 6 extern link geography[edit] capitol reef vicin petroglyph capitol gorg mani white sandston dome fruita school hous capitol gorg old road capitol narrows, 1935 capitol reef encompass waterpocket fold, warp earth' crust 65 million year old. largest expos monoclin north america. fold, newer older layer earth fold s-shape. warp, probabl caus collid continent plate creat rocki mountains, weather erod millennia expos layer rock fossils. park fill brilliantli color sandston cliffs, gleam white domes, contrast layer stone earth. area name line white dome cliff navajo sandstone, look somewhat like unit state capitol building, run fremont river pleasant creek waterpocket fold. fold form north-to-south barrier even today bare breach roads. earli settler refer parallel, impass ridg "reefs", park get second half name. first pave road construct area 1962. today, state rout 24 cut park travel east west canyonland nation park bryce canyon nation park, pave road invad rug landscape. park fill canyons, cliffs, towers, domes, arches. fremont river cut canyon part waterpocket fold, park arid desert country. scenic drive show park visitor highlights, run mile main highway. hundr mile trail unpav road lead adventur equal scenic backcountry. history[edit] nativ american mormons[edit] fremont cultur nativ american live near perenni fremont river northern part capitol reef waterpocket fold around 1000 ce. irrig crop lentils, maize, squash store grain stone granari (in part made numer black basalt boulder litter area). 13th century, nativ american cultur area underw sudden change, like due long drought[cit needed]. fremont settlement field abandoned. mani year fremont left, paiut move area. numic speak peopl name fremont granari moki hut thought home race tini peopl moki. 1872 alan h. thompson, surveyor attach unit state armi major john wesley powell' expedition, cross waterpocket fold explor area. geologist clarenc dutton later spent sever summer studi area' geology. none expedit explor waterpocket fold great extent, however. was, now, incred rug forbidding. follow american civil war, offici church jesu christ latter-day saint salt lake citi sought establish mission remotest nich intermountain west. 1866, quasi-militari expedit mormon pursuit nativ penetr high valley west. 1870s, settler move valleys, eventu establish loa, fremont, lyman, bicknell, torrey.[3] mormon settl fremont river valley 1880 establish junction (later renam fruita), cainevil aldridge. fruita prospered, cainevil bare survived, aldridg died.[3] addit farming, lime extract local limeston uranium extract earli 20th century. 1904 first claim uranium mine area staked. result oyler mine grand wash produc uranium ore. 1920 work hard life fruita good. ten famili one time sustain fertil flood plain fremont river land chang ownership years. area remain isolated.[3] commun later abandon later still build restor nation park service. kiln use produc lime still seen sulphur creek near campground scenic drive. earli protect efforts[edit] local ephraim portman pectol organ "booster club" torrey 1921. pectol press promot campaign, furnish stori sent period newspapers. efforts, increasingli aid brother-in-law, joseph s. hickman, wayn counti high school principal. 1924, hickman extend commun involv promot effort organ wayn county-wid wayn wonderland club. year, educ elect utah state legislature.[5] 1933, pectol elect presid associ civic club southern utah, successor wayn wonderland club. club rais u.s. $150.00 interest salt lake citi photograph take seri promot photographs. sever years, photograph – j.e. broaddu – travel lectur "wayn wonderland".[5] 1933, pectol elect legislatur almost immedi contact presid franklin d. roosevelt ask creation "wayn wonderland nation monument" feder land compris bulk capitol reef area. feder agenc began feasibl studi boundari assessment. meanwhile, pectol guid govern investig numer trips, escort increas number visitors. lectur broaddu effect.[5] presid roosevelt sign proclam creat capitol reef nation monument august 2, 1937. proclam 2246, presid roosevelt set asid 37,711 acr (15,261&#160;ha) capitol reef area. compris area extend two mile (3&#160;km) north present state rout 24 10&#160;mi (16&#160;km) south, past capitol gorge. great depress year lean one nation park servic (nps), new administ agency. fund administr capitol reef nonexistent; would long time first ranger would arrive.[3] administr monument[edit] administr new monument place control zion nation park.[5] stone ranger cabin sulphur creek bridg built road work perform civilian conserv corp work progress administration. historian printer charl kelli came know np offici zion well volunt 'watchdog' park nps. kelli offici appoint 'custodian-without-pay' 1943.[5] work volunt 1950 np offer civil servic appoint first superintendent.[5] 1950 kelli deepli troubl np manag acced demand u.s. atom energi commiss capitol reef nation monument open uranium prospecting. felt decis mistak destruct long term nation interest. turn out, enough ore monument worth mining.[5] 1958 kelli got addit perman help protect monument enforc regulations; park ranger grant clark transfer zion. year clark arrived, fifty-six thousand visitor came park 'charlie' kelli retir last time, full year experiences.[5] 1960 (under program name mission 66), np area nationwid receiv new facil meet demand mushroom park visitation. capitol reef, 53-site campground fruita, staff rental housing, new visitor center built, latter open 1966.[3] visit climb dramat paved, all-weath state rout 24 built 1962 fremont river canyon near fruita. state rout 24 replac narrow capitol gorg wagon road 10&#160;mi (16&#160;km) south frequent wash out. old road sinc open foot traffic. 1967, 146,598 person visit park. staff also growing.[3] 1960s, np proceed purchas privat land parcel fruita pleasant creek. almost privat properti pass public ownership "will buyer-wil seller" basis.[3] preservationist convinc presid lyndon b. johnson set asid enorm area public land 1968, left office. presidenti proclam 3888 addit 215,056 acr (87,030&#160;ha) place np control. 1970, capitol reef nation monument compris 254,251 acr (102,892&#160;ha) sprawl southeast thousand lake mountain almost colorado river. action controversi locally, np staf monument inadequ properli manag addit land.[3] nation park status[edit] vast enlarg monument diversif scenic resourc soon rais anoth issue: whether capitol reef nation park, rather monument. two bill introduc unit state congress.[3] hous bill (h.r. 17152) introduc utah congressman laurenc j. burton call 180,000-acr (72,800&#160;ha) nation park adjunct 48,000-acr (19,400&#160;ha) nation recreat area multipl use (includ grazing) could continu indefinitely. unit state senate, meanwhile, senat bill s. 531 alreadi pass juli 1, 1970, provid 230,000-acr (93,100&#160;ha) nation park alone. bill call 25-year phase-out grazing.[3] septemb 1970, unit state depart interior offici told hous subcommitte session prefer 254,000 acr (103,000&#160;ha) set asid nation park. also recommend graze phase-out period 10 years, rather 25. favor adjunct recreat area.[3] late 1971 congression action completed. then, 92nd unit state congress session s. 531 languished. new bill, s. 29, introduc senat senat frank e. moss utah essenti defunct s. 531 except call addit 10,834 acr (4,384&#160;ha) public land capitol reef nation park. house, utah repres k. gunn mckay (with repres lloyd) introduc h.r. 9053 replac dead h.r. 17152. time around, hous bill drop concept adjunct capitol reef nation recreat area adopt senat concept 25-year limit continu grazing. depart interior still recommend nation park 254,368 acr (102,939&#160;ha) 10-year limit graze phase-out.[3] s. 29 pass senat june sent house. hous subsequ drop bill pass senat version amendment. senat agreement hous amendment, differ work confer committee. confer committe issu agre report novemb 30, 1971. legislation—'an act establish capitol reef nation park state utah'—becam public law 92-207 sign presid richard nixon decemb 18, 1971.[3] geology[edit] main article: geolog capitol reef area hickman bridg area includ park edg ancient shallow sea invad land permian, creat cutler formation. sandston youngest member cutler formation, white rim, expos park. deepen sea left carbon deposits, form limeston kaibab limestone, format rim grand canyon southwest. triassic, stream deposit reddish-brown silt, later becam siltston moenkopi formation. uplift eros followed. conglomerate, follow logs, sand, mud, wind-transport volcan ash, form uranium-contain chinl formation. member glen canyon group laid middl late triassic time increas aridity. include: wingat sandstone: sand dune shore ancient sea. kayenta formation: thin-bed layer sand deposit slow-mov stream channel across low plains. navajo sandstone: huge fossil sand dune massiv sahara-lik desert. san rafael group consist four jurass period formations, oldest youngest: carmel formation: gypsum, sand, limey silt laid may graben period flood sea water. entrada sandstone: sandston barrier islands/sand bar near-shor environment. curti formation: made conglomerate, sandstone, shale. summervil formation: reddish-brown mud white sand deposit tidal flats. stream laid mud sand channels, lakebeds, swampi plains, creat morrison formation. earli cretaceous, similar nonmarin sediment laid becam dakota sandstone. eventually, cretac seaway cover dakota, deposit manco shale. small remnant mesaverd group found, cap mesa park' eastern section. near end cretac period, mountain-build event call laramid orogeni start compact uplift region, form rocki mountain creat monoclin waterpocket fold park. ten fifteen million year ago, entir region uplift much creation colorado plateaus. remarkably, uplift even. igneou activ form volcan dike sill intrus also occur time. drainag system area rearrang steepened, caus stream downcut faster sometim chang course. wetter time ice age pleistocen increas rate erosion. visit park[edit] tower rock layer capitol reef golden throne, rock format capitol reef nation park. though park famou white dome navajo sandstone, dome' color result linger section yellow carmel format carbonate, stain underli rock. town nearest capitol reef torrey, utah, lie eight mile (13&#160;km) west visitor' center highway 24. torrey small, sever motel restaurants. park larg campground, often fill earli afternoon busi summer weekends. burr trail scenic backway provid access west grand staircase-escalant nation monument town boulder. overnight camp within park requir permit ranger visitor' center. activ park includ hiking, horseback riding, drive tour. mountain bike prohibit park, mani trail outsid park exist. orchard plant mormon pioneer maintain park servic differ fruit harvest throughout grow season visitor small fee. references[edit] &#160;thi articl incorporates&#160;publ domain materi websit document nation park service. geolog nation parks: fifth edition, ann g. harris, esther tuttle, sherwood d., tuttl (iowa, kendall/hunt publishing; 1997) isbn 0-7872-5353-7 barrier crossroads: administr histori capitol reef nation park, utah. www.nps.gov explor america: nation parks, reader' digest association, 1993 capitol reef offici map guide, nation park service, 1989 nation parks: index 2001–2003.
